name: Lippens the Lizard
description:
Eat the little things until you get big enough to eat the big things until you can't sustain your metabolism and die.

Made for TOJAM #13.

Note: Only a Windows build as I neglected to download Mac support when I setup Unity...whoops.

Updated v1.2 2018-05-12 - lots of fixes and tweaks, lots of graphics updates, added scoring and high scores!

Updated on 2018-05-11 - added snake, ladybug, tweaked some values.
